document_data.name: Pickled Rice
document_data.mainbody: '''Pickled rice''' was a side dish from the [[Red Wizards]]' nation of [[Thay]] and the eastern land of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Description: In [[Priador]]'s capital â€“ [[Bezantur]], pickled rice was often served as a side and a bed for the [[jellied egg]] dish, while in [[Wang Kuo]] province in [[Shou Lung]], pickled rice and raw [[fish]] were used in making [[sushi]], a food tradition learned from the [[Kozakuran]] peoples of Kara-Tur.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, [[Aznar Thrul]], the [[Zulkir of Evocation]] and the [[Tharchion]] of Priador, favored jellied eggs with pickled rice. He enjoyed the dish's blood-red yolk oozing out of the dish like real blood, mixing with the rice.
